## `wp-admin.all.login`

Remove login components for all roles.

### Options;

```php
<?php

return [
    'wp-admin.all' => [
        'login',
        'login.logo',
        'login.remember',
        'login.nav',
        'login.back',
        'login.policy',
    ],
];
```

### Bug?

* **[Please open an issue](https://github.com/soberwp/intervention/issues/new?title=[wp-admin.login]&labels=bug&assignees=darrenjacoby)**
